meanings.definition: The part of an airport that is not airside.
meanings.sent1: The landside of the airport is where passengers check in for their flights.
meanings.sent2: I waited at the landside of the airport to pick up my friend.
meanings.sent3: The landside of the airport was bustling with travelers trying to catch their flights.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like the landside of an airport, constantly busy and full of activity.
meanings.sent5: The landside of the airport was a hive of activity, with people rushing to catch their flights.

meanings.definition: The area of land that is not covered by water.
meanings.sent1: The beautiful landside stretched out as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent2: We decided to explore the landside and enjoy the scenery.
meanings.sent3: The landside was a peaceful escape from the busy city life.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like the vast landside, open and free.
meanings.sent5: The landside was a picture-perfect landscape, with rolling hills and lush greenery.
